topic.title: Admin Page: Managing Content in expeDITA
topic.shortdesc: The Admin interface in the expeDITA framework brings all the content and all the tools into a single workplace, usually within the same themeatic look and feel as the main portions of the current workspace.

body.p: In a typical workflow, admin-level users will log in, find a resource, register users, select an editor, etc..
Briefly explain how to reposition widgets for admin activities.

ul.li: enable "Delete" "Edit" "Rename" in the tools for each file.
Add an "Edit" tool for the current resource.
